items.id: Books/Book Reviews/97 Things Every Programmer Should Know
items.title: 97 Things Every Programmer Should Know
items.description: This book is a collection of 97 software engineering tips and advice from experts in the field. It contains non-technical advice, technical advice and thoughts from a pretty large corpus of experience.
items.permalink: /docs/Books/Book Reviews/97 Things Every Programmer Should Know

items.title: Pytest
items.description: Pytests is a wrapper around the unit test python test framework. It makes it a bit easier to write tests.
